message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this unique opportunity to purchase a valuable product. I believe you'll find it's a great fit for your needs. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1400000.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product you're selling. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1350000.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $1450000. I believe it's a fair price considering the product's value to you.
I understand your perspective, Alice. While I value the product, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1425000.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I still need to make a profit. I'm thinking of $1460000. It's a fair price considering the product's value to you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1447500.
